channel.title: Color Throwdown on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Color Throwdown on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Color Throwdown #706*
item.description: I had to play along with the latest challenge at Color Throwdown because I really love the look of blue and green together. I usually choose the brighter forms of these colours to go together but I strayed from that with this card to use up a scrap of very old patterned paper I had in my stash. Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Marina Mist *Paper: My Mind’s Eye *Images: Spellbinders Sentiments for Your

item.title: *Color Throwdown #699*
item.description: I love the inspiration photo from the current Color Throwdown challenge so I had to play along. But then I was stumped as to what I wanted to do… I do much better with sketch challenges than colour challenges I think! I pulled out a stencil I haven’t used yet and this is the result. I was going to orient my card the other way however the glitter paste made a mess in one area under the stencil so I flipped the panel and covered it with my sentiment!

item.title: *Color Throwdown #698*
item.description: I’m playing along with the current challenge at Color Throwdown. I loved the look of the inspiration photo! I have seen a few people do this idea of layering their die cuts to show the rainbow of colour… it was harder to do than I expected, but I think it turned out OK! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Basic Black, Parakeet Party, Real Red, Yoyo Yellow, Pink Passion *Dies: MFT Celebrate; Lawn Fawn Everyday Sentiment Banners

item.title: *Two Challenges*
item.description: I’m playing along with two challenges today… Color Throwdown #696 and CAS on Friday #233. The colours of the first challenge fit the theme of “condolence” for the second challenge absolutely perfectly! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Very Vanilla, Crumb Cake, Pear Pizzazz *Images: Altenew Flower Vine *Ink: Versafine Clair Nocturne *Dies: Stampin’ Up! Pierced Blooms, Spendid Stems; MFT Stitched Rectangles *Etc: foam adhesive *Challenges: Color Throwdown #696; CAS on Friday #233

item.title: *Color Throwdown #695*
item.description: I pulled out a stencil that I purchased right before I broke my wrist. Ink blending still isn’t easy (and honestly it can hurt) but this was quick and I was able to get through it. I loved the look of the colours in the current Color Throwdown Challenge so that’s what I went with for this card. Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Basic Black; silver mirror *Images: MFT Big Birthday Sentiments
